member.name: M:Sharpmake.Generators.FastBuild.Bff.GetLatestTargetPlatformVersion(Sharpmake.DevEnv)
member.summary: Find the latest usable kit root

member.name: M:Sharpmake.Generators.FastBuild.Bff.IsObjectList(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Method that allows to determine for a specified dependency if it's a library or an object list. if a dep is within the list, the second condition check if objects is present which means that the current dependency is considered to be a force objectlist.
member.param: all the dependencies of a specific project configuration
additional dependency clear of additional suffix
member.returns: return boolean value of presence of a dep within the containing dependencies list

member.name: T:Sharpmake.Generators.FastBuild.IClangPlatformBff
member.summary: Augments the interface to provide services for platforms that are based on Clang.

member.name: T:Sharpmake.Generators.FastBuild.IMicrosoftPlatformBff
member.summary: Augments the interface to provide services for Microsoft's proprietary platforms.

member.name: T:Sharpmake.Generators.FastBuild.IPlatformBff
member.summary: Interface that exposes the required methods and properties to generate a .bff file for FastBuild using Sharpmake.

member.name: P:Sharpmake.Generators.FastBuild.IPlatformBff.BffPlatformDefine
member.summary: Gets the main `#define` symbol for that platform in the BFF file.
member.remarks: Note that this is *NOT* the C or C++ define symbol. The BFF scripts support the `#define` instruction, and this property returns a symbol that tells the scripts whether we're dealing with a given platform.

member.name: M:Sharpmake.Generators.FastBuild.IPlatformBff.CConfigName(Sharpmake.Configuration)
member.summary: Gets a configuration name for that platform in the .bff file for the code files that are written in native C code.

member.name: M:Sharpmake.Generators.FastBuild.IPlatformBff.CppConfigName(Sharpmake.Configuration)
member.summary: Gets a configuration name for that platform in the .bff file for the code files that are written in native C++ code.

member.name: M:Sharpmake.Generators.FastBuild.IPlatformBff.AddLibPrefix(Sharpmake.Configuration)
member.summary: Gets whether a library prefix (usually `lib`) is required on that platform when building libraries.
member.param: The under which the check is requested.
member.returns: `true` if a prefix is required, `false` otherwise.

The project configuration
The file name of the build output.

member.summary: Get the extra list of build steps to execute for this platform.
member.param: The project configuration
The file name of the build output.
member.returns: The list of post build step to execute.

member.name: M:Sharpmake.Generators.FastBuild.IPlatformBff.GetOutputFilename(Sharpmake.Project.Configuration.OutputType,System.String)

The original file name of the build output.
member.returns: The final file name of the build output.

member.name: T:Sharpmake.Generators.IFileGenerator
member.summary: Interface that exposes facilities for generating text-based files.

member.name: P:Sharpmake.Generators.IFileGenerator.Resolver
member.summary: Gets the instance that the generator uses to resolve the symbols between square brackets `[...]` when and are called.

member.name: M:Sharpmake.Generators.IFileGenerator.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes text to the file being generated, resolving the symbols between square brackets `[...]` along the way.
member.param: The text to write into the file.

member.name: M:Sharpmake.Generators.IFileGenerator.Write(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes text to the file being generated, resolving the symbols between square brackets `[...]` along and way. Uses a default value when the resolve process fails.
member.param: The text to write into the file.
A to use when the resolve fails

member.name: M:Sharpmake.Generators.IFileGenerator.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a line of text to the file being generated, resolving the symbols between square brackets `[...]` along the way.
member.param: The line of text to write into the file.

member.summary: Writes a line of text to the file being generated, resolving the symbols between square brackets `[...]` along the way. Uses a default value when the resolve process fails.

member.name: M:Sharpmake.Generators.IFileGenerator.WriteVerbatim(System.String)
member.summary: Writes text to the file being generated as-is, without resolving anything.
member.param: The text to write into the file.

member.name: M:Sharpmake.Generators.IFileGenerator.WriteLineVerbatim(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a line of text to the file being generated as-is, without resolving anything.
member.param: The text to write into the file.

member.summary: Declares one or several variables to be replaced while resolving.

member.returns: An object that implements and will automatically undefine the variable when it's method is invoked.
